description: Customized end-to-end production solutions for private labels, including formulation, processing, and bulk packaging under strict quality control.
Temperature-controlled storage and distribution services ensuring your perishable processed foods stay between 2°C and 4°C from plant to shelf.
Expert food technologists help develop new recipes, improve shelf-life, and optimize nutritional profiles using advanced lab testing.
High-tech packaging services that allow food products to remain shelf-stable for up to 18 months without the need for artificial preservatives.
Comprehensive safety audits including HACCP verification, allergen testing, and microbial analysis to ensure 100% compliance with FSSAI standards.
Large-scale industrial dehydration services for vegetables and fruits, converting raw produce into high-quality flakes, granules, or fine powders.
